hints.content:
Ying ran $\goldE{18}$ laps at running club.

![A number line starts at 18.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ee0c812ea914e50c528cfe76eb1dca0fd85bfa23)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

Then Ying ran $\maroonD{14}$ more laps before school.

![A number line starts at 18 with plus 14 and goes to 32. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aab5d43169f6ec61e18a272ead680d625f379ad1)

$\goldE{18} + \maroonD{14} = 32$

Then Ying ran $\blueE{13}$ more laps at lunch.

![A number line starts at 18 with plus 14 and goes to 32. From 32 plus 13 goes to 45. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9a6b18773d39b5807e205a4a8996913e6c5b6b1)

$32+  \blueE{13} = 45$

At recess, Ying ran $\purpleD{20}$ laps.

![A number line starts at 18 with plus 14 and goes to 32. From 32 plus 13 goes to 45. From 45 plus 20 goes to 65.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7a690df9fd07414aba55666e1c5c1e74506696bf)

$45+\purpleD{20} = 65$

This number line represents how to find total laps Ying has run:

![A number line starts at 18 with plus 14 and goes to 32. From 32 plus 13 goes to 45. From 45 plus 20 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7e482dea8794abef55cd12964849ba2f4bd0dbf0)

Ying ran $65$ laps.

question.content:
Ying ran $18$ laps for Running Club.  

Then, Ying ran $14$ more laps before school, $13$ more laps at lunch, and $20$ more laps at recess.  

**Which number line shows how to find how many total laps Ying has run?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

**How many laps has Ying run?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] laps

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 0 with plus 14 and goes to 14. From 14 plus 13 goes to 27. From 27 plus 20 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8fc1f0f55f68d2cefc6f552c452ec50c7aa3d7f0)

![A number line starts at 18 with plus 14 and goes to 32. From 32 plus 13 goes to 45. From 45 plus 20 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7e482dea8794abef55cd12964849ba2f4bd0dbf0)
